oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SYNTHESIS OF SUBSTITUTED DIOXABICYCLO[N.2.1]ALKANES THROUGH PALLADIUM-CATALYZED OXIDATIVE CYCLIZATION
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALU, N
BHAT, SV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cyclization
derivatives
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Epoxy alpha,beta-unsaturated esters derived from diene-ester 1 underwent one-pot regioselective oxidative cyclisation to form substituted dioxabicyclo[n.2.1]alkanes in the presence of Na2PdCl4, Bu(t)O2H-aq. acetic acid in good yield.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY-CHEMICAL COMMUNICATIONS, (7), 903-904
